pr_title: Make the status message errors take precedence over action messages

timeline.message: fix: Make the status message errors take precedence over action messages.

timeline.bodyText: Roles table was not showing forbidden permission message.
timeline.author: psantos1113

timeline.bodyText: Show either the error message or the action message.  Error message takes precedence.
timeline.author: psantos1113
